title: Weather App
content: This was my first React project.

It was part of the curriculum for a course I did by Tyler McGinnis called React Fundamentals. Despite being part of a course, the project was only loosely guided. In the words of Tyler, 'The goal here is to give you just enough guidance for you to struggle without drowning.'
It is a very simple weather app which accepts an input from the user (a city or place), then queries a weather API for that parameter, parses the response, and displays a forecast.
